H0.text: Goggles are the object a scientist most likely uses to watch birds from far away.

H1.text: Binoculars are the object that a scientist is most likely using to watch birds from far away.

H2.text: Sunglasses are the object the scientist is most likely using to watch birds from far away.

H3.text: Microscope is the object the scientist is most likely using to watch birds from far away.

A4.text: a binocular is their most basic tool because most human eyes cannot resolve sufficient detail to fully appreciate and/or study small birds.

A5.text: a binocular is their most basic tool
